sen.j: 澤村 訥子（さわむら とっし）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Tosshi SAWAMURA is a kabuki actor.
Tosshi SAWAMURA is a name used by Kabuki actors.
sen.cmt: 複数名いるため、a kabuki actor→a name used by Kabuki actorsとしました。
sen.e: Tosshi SAWAMURA is a name used by Kabuki actors.

sen.cmt: ウィキペディアのサイトでは、次のハイフンで始まる原文と一続きになっているようです。次の文をコロン（:）で始める対応をとっています。以下同様。初代、二代目などはローマ数字のⅠ、Ⅱなどを使った表記（Tosshi SAWAMURA Ⅰなど）が 多いようですが、ローマ数字は環境依存文字となるため、1st, 2ndなどの表記としています。

sen.j: - 澤村宗十郎 (初代)の俳名。
sen.e: : The haimyo (the term originally refers to a pen name as a haiku poet, but it also refers to a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) of Sojuro SAWAMURA (1st).
: The haimyo (a Kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the First).
sen.cmt: haimyoの補足修正、1st→the Firstとしました。
sen.e: : The haimyo (a Kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the First).

sen.j: - 澤村宗十郎 (2代目)の俳名。
sen.e: : The haimyo of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the Second).
: The haimyo of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the Second).

sen.j: - 澤村宗十郎 (3代目)の俳名。
sen.e: : The haimyo of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the Third).
: The haimyo of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the Third).

sen.j: - 澤村宗十郎 (4代目)の俳名。
sen.e: : The haimyo of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the Fourth).
: The haimyo of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the Fourth).

sen.j: - 澤村宗十郎 (5代目)の俳名。
sen.e: : The haimyo of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the Fifth).
: The haimyo of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the Fifth).

sen.j: - 4代目助高屋高助（後の澤村訥升 (2代目)）の俳名。
sen.e: : The haimyo of Takasuke SUKETAKAYA 4th (later Tossho SAWAMURA [2nd]).
: The haimyo of Takasuke SUKETAKAYA the Fourth (later Tossho SAWAMURA [the Second]).
sen.cmt: the Fourth, the Secondとしました。
sen.e: : The haimyo of Takasuke SUKETAKAYA the Fourth (later Tossho SAWAMURA [the Second]).

sen.j: 死後6代目宗十郎追贈される。
sen.e: He was conferred the name Sojuro 6th posthumously.
He was conferred the name Sojuro the Sixth posthumously.
He was conferred the name Sojuro the Sixth posthumously.
: An adopted child of the Sixth.
: An adopted child of the Sixth.

sen.j: 本名を伊藤 千之助。
sen.e: His real name was Sennosuke ITO.
His real name was Sennosuke ITO.
His real name was Sennosuke ITO.
: An adopted son-in-law of the Seventh.
sen.cmt: スペース追加、7th→the Seventhとしました。
sen.e: : An adopted son-in-law of the Seventh.
His real name was Daikichi SUZUKI.
His real name was Daikichi SUZUKI.
His real name was Daikichi SUZUKI.
